ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates how [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v4.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting3D~SciChart.Charting3D.Modifiers.ZoomExtentsModifier3D.html']ZoomExtentsModifier[/url], [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v4.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting3D~SciChart.Charting3D.Modifiers.OrbitModifier3D.html']OrbitModifier[/url], [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v4.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting3D~SciChart.Charting3D.Modifiers.MouseWheelZoomModifier3D.html']MouseWheelModifier[/url] works and how to rotate camera.
ExampleDefinition.Description:
Demonstrates how [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v4.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting3D~SciChart.Charting3D.Modifiers.ZoomExtentsModifier3D.html']ZoomExtentsModifier[/url], [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v4.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting3D~SciChart.Charting3D.Modifiers.OrbitModifier3D.html']OrbitModifier[/url], [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v4.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting3D~SciChart.Charting3D.Modifiers.MouseWheelZoomModifier3D.html']MouseWheelModifier[/url] works and how to rotate camera.
[b][i]Tip![/i][/b]
[b]Click RV to rotate camera verticaly or click RH and rotate camera horizontaly.[/b]
